_sText:
This is a map that I created, the idea of it was to mess about with cubemaps and learn about them so I kept with something nice and simple, was a quick map to make, most time was spend lining up textures and testing the map with the cubemaps compiled + campspot testing and in all took 15-20 hours which for me is pretty quick personally.

I used the cube texture that you see in portal as this has nice reflections, it has very good fps but overall its really there for simple game play as I think the best zm maps are the simple ones, is more about fun then looks.

Has 3 main areas each with either 1 or more camp spots but its more for a mix of camping hunting and running around.
